title: Ensuring sustainability in diabetic retinopathy screening
details: J Smith, D Wright, N Lois, I Stratton, P Scanlon - Endocrine Abstracts, 2024
abstract: Fixed annual interval screening for referable diabetic retinopathy (RDR) irrespective of the calculable risk of it developing is wasteful and unsustainable in the era of Precision medicine. Prediction models exist that can identify the at-risk and low-risk …
